content: elevation pillow crochet pattern by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful https //www ravelry com/designers/susan-e-kennedy @prettypeacefulcrochet on instagram pretty peaceful on facebook pretty peaceful youtube video tutorials video tutorial https //youtu be/vs2licgqwag finished size 11 by 15 28 by 38 cm to fit a 12 by 16 30 by 40 cm pillow form yarn dk weight the sample pillow used one cake of lion brand mandala 100% acrylic yarn in the lochness colorway 590 yards/540 m per 150-gram cake purchase the kit including the yarn pillow form and printed pattern at www prettypeaceful com pillow form required 12 by 16 30 by 40 cm hook 2 75 mm us c gauge 23 5 sts and 20 row = 4 inches 10 cm terms us chain chain yarn over and pull through loop on hook single_crochet single_crochet insert hook into stitch yarn over pull through stitch yarn over pull through two loops on hook blo back loop only sts stitches elevation pillow crochet pattern © 2025 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful pattern notes the pillow is all single_crochet stitches in the back loop only in us terms the yarn is cut after each row and new yarn is joined to begin the next row a 6 15 cm yarn tail at the start and end of each row create fringe that is knotted to close the sides of the pillow the starting chain 1 does not count as a stitch the work is not turned after each row- keep the same side facing up it is easiest to separate the cake of lion brand mandala into the 11 individual colors of yarn before starting here is the tutorial video for the elevation pillow on youtube that shows how to do that https //youtu be/vs2licgqwag elevation pillow front/back make 2 row 1 leaving a 6 yarn tail chain 89 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and each chain across fasten_off leaving a 6 yarn tail do not turn 88 sts or foundation single_crochet 88 sts leaving a 6 yarn tail at the start and end fasten_off do not turn row 2 insert hook in blo of first stitch yarn over with a new strand of yarn and pull through the stitch leaving a 6 yarn tail chain 1 single_crochet in blo of each st across fasten_off leaving a 6 yarn tail do not turn 88 sts row 3-55 repeat row 2 changing yarn colors after every 5 row or as desired if you run out of a color of yarn while crocheting the back complete the rest of that section of 5 row with the next color of yarn elevation pillow crochet pattern © 2025 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful join the front and back of the pillow with the right sides facing out where you can see the ridges from crocheting in the back loop only and the smoother wrong sides facing in toward each other single_crochet into both row 1 of the front and row 1 of the back
